s.text: We have used the cell line LNCaP as a model to examine the role of SKP2 in androgen control of p27 expression and cell cycle progression in human prostate cancer cells.
Proteins were transferred onto Immobilon P membrane (Millipore), blocked in 5 % nonfat dry milk dissolved in tris-buffered saline / 0.1 % Tween and probed with the various antibodies.
